Name: Gloom Chaser (Embury)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist (or cherry).
Review: Grenadine adds a pink-red hue but absinthe ensures this Martini remains dry. Nonetheless, this drink may chase your gloom (blues) away.
History: Adapted from a recipe David A. Embury 's 1948 The Fine Art of Mixing Drinks .
Nutrition: One serving of Gloom Chaser (Embury) contains 153 calories
